resources.string: A familial unmissable ceremononial event where Adam Winter and Eve Noel unite in marriage. The event will involve activities to engage toddlers to grown ups and of course the marital proclamation. The event is open to all, importantly family and friends, though a brief note of attendance will be required for venue safety regulations and catering. It is on a first book first serve basis.
Huddersfield St Peters C of E Parish Church
Byram Street, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, HD1 1BU
Check your email for the code
1. Click on \'Get Ticket\' in the menu
2. Fill out the form with valid personal details
4. Check the inbox of the email you have given for a confirmation code
6. Make sure you\'re on the \'Confirmation\' page and paste this code into the text box where it is specified
What if I want to bring others (kids/adults)?
You can simply fill in the form in their behalf and only add your contact details.
How do I find the address?
The address is stated in the main screen, click on the name of the venue to go to their website and the address for google maps via web browser. There is also an interactive map in the menu.
What if I don’t have an email?
You can put down someone else\’s email as long as you can retrieve the code for verification.
How long do I have to verify my sign-up?
The code expires as soon as you shut down this app.
What if I want to change my mind about coming?
